Pregnancy Details  
Antenatal Care:  
• First Antenatal Visit:  10/12/1984 at Royal Hampshire County Hospital  
• Antenatal Visits:  Regular visits every 4 weeks until 28 weeks, then every 2 weeks until 
36 weeks, and weekly thereafter. • Ultrasound Scans:  
o Dating Scan:  12 weeks, confirmed estimated due date (EDD) of 19/08/1985  
o Anomaly Scan:  20 weeks, normal findings. • Blood Tests:  
o Routine blood tests:  Normal  
o Glucose tolerance test (GTT):  Normal  
o Group B Streptococcus:  Negative  
• Blood Pressure:  Well-controlled throughout pregnancy. Complications During Pregnancy:  
• Mild nausea and vomiting:  Managed with dietary changes and small frequent meals. • No other significant complications. Labour and Delivery  
Onset of Labour:  
• Labour started spontaneously at 39 weeks and 2 days. • Contractions:  Began at 10:30 PM on 14/08/1985, regular and progressively stronger. Admission to Hospital:

• Admitted to the labour ward at Royal Hampshire County Hospital at 12:15 AM on 
15/08/1985. Labour Progression:  
• Cervical Dilation:  4 cm on admission, progressing to full dilation by 03:15 AM. • Pain Relief:  Entonox (gas and air) during active labour. No epidural was requested. • Delivery Time:  03:45 AM  
• Placental Delivery:  Placenta delivered spontaneously within 10 minutes of birth, intact 
and complete. Postnatal Care  
Mother:  
• Immediate Postnatal Observation:  Stable, with normal vital signs. • Perineal Tear:  First-degree tear, managed with sutures. • Breastfeeding:  Initiated within the first hour of birth; successful latch. • Postnatal Monitoring:  Regular checks; discharged on 17/08/1985 after 48 hours of 
observation. Newborn:  
• Immediate Care:  Newborn assessed, Apgar scores recorded. • Breastfeeding:  Successfully initiated within the first hour. • Newborn Screening:  Blood spot test performed on 17/08/1985, results normal. • Hearing Test:  Conducted on 16/08/1985, normal. • Vitamin K:  Administered via intramuscular injection shortly after birth. Discharge Information  
Mother and Baby Discharged on:  17/08/1985  
Follow-Up Appointment:  
• Midwife Home Visit:  Scheduled for 19/08/1985  
• Six-Week Postnatal Check:  Scheduled with GP on 26/09/1985  
Breastfeeding Support:  Referral to local breastfeeding clinic for additional support, if 
needed.
